Text.val: @OCM702 is a submodule of OCM700, permissions, button lables are inherited from OCM700
07.08.2014 GB SCR19053 Chnaged number of color
15.05.2014 GB SCR18901 Added color for line

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DREX.DREX_ADMNO, DREX.DREX_CLNTNO, DREX.DREX_DEBH_NO, DEBH.DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DREX.DREX_TOTALDEBTORBALANCE, DREX.DREX_TOTALREFLIMEXCEEDED, DREX.DREX_TOTALCLIENTBALANCEJUR, DREX.DREX_PERCREFLIMEXCEEDEDJUR, DREX_EXPORTLC, DREX_EXTERNALGUARANTEE from :1/DREX DREX, :1/DEBH DEBH where DREX.DREX_DEBH_NO = DEBH.DEBH_NO :2 order by DREX.DREX_ADMNO, DREX.DREX_CLNTNO, DREX.DREX_DEBH_NO for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select DREX.DREX_ADMNO, DREX.DREX_CLNTNO, DREX.DREX_DEBH_NO, DEBH.DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DREX.DREX_TOTALDEBTORBALANCE, DREX.DREX_TOTALREFLIMEXCEEDED, DREX.DREX_TOTALCLIENTBALANCEJUR, DREX.DREX_PERCREFLIMEXCEEDEDJUR from :1/DREX DREX, :1/DEBH DEBH where DREX.DREX_DEBH_NO = DEBH.DEBH_NO :2 order by DREX.DREX_ADMNO, DREX.DREX_CLNTNO, DREX.DREX_DEBH_NO for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

ExpSyntax.val: Trim (MlsTrans ('Administration number'))&';'&Trim (MlsTrans ('Client number'))&';'&Trim (MlsTrans ('Comfin number'))&';'&Trim (MlsTrans ('Debtor name'))&';'&Trim (MlsTrans ('Total debtor balance'))&';'&Trim (MlsTrans ('Total reflim exceeded'))

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBC.DEBC_NO, DEBC.DEBC_DEBC, DEBB.DEBB_ACTINVAH, DEBB.DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH, DEBC.DEBC_EXPORTLC, DEBC.DEBC_EXTERNALGUARANTEE from :1/DEBC DEBC, :1/DEBB DEBB where DEBC.DEBC_NO = DEBB.DEBB_DEBC_NO and DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO = :2 and DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO = :3 and DEBC.DEBC_DEBH = :4 and DEBC.DEBC_DATDELETED is null and DEBB.DEBB_ACTINVAH > 0 order by DEBC.DEBC_DEBC for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select count(*) from :1/DEBC DEBC, :1/DEBB DEBB where DEBB.DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC.DEBC_NO and DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO = :2 and DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO = :3 and DEBC.DEBC_DEBH = :4 and DEBC.DEBC_DATDELETED is null and DEBB.DEBB_ACTINVAH > 0 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select DEBC.DEBC_NO from :1/DEBC DEBC, :1/DEBB DEBB where DEBB.DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC.DEBC_NO and DEBC.DEBC_ADMNO = :2 and DEBC.DEBC_CLNTNO = :3 and DEBC.DEBC_DEBH = :4 and DEBC.DEBC_DATDELETED is null and DEBB.DEBB_ACTINVAH > 0 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
